explanation: [0-0] The video starts with a split screen. On the left, a young man with glasses wearing a grayish-white outerwear is sitting in front of a piano, holding an open notebook. There are floor-to-ceiling windows and a TV in the room, and a small yellow chick toy is placed on the piano. The video on the right shows a hand wearing a metal device that is connected to the fingers. At the top of the video is the white English text "Take it easy".
[0-2] Then, the left video shows the man writing with a pen, while the right video shows the metal device controlling the finger to bend and straighten quickly.
